units.title: Detach hPSCs for 3D VM organoid initiation
units.text: To start 3D VM organoid differentiation, RC17, H9, HS999, HS1001, and TH-Cre hPSC cells were detached from the culture dish with 0.5 mM Accutase (Thermo Fisher Scientiﬁc, #A1110501) to yield a single cell
units.rationale: Specifies the first step of preparing single hPSC cells for organoid formation.

units.title: Plate single cells for differentiation
units.text: Differentiation was initiated by plating 2500 single cells in each well of (Miltenyi, #130-103-456), 400 ng/ml SHH-C24II (Miltenyi, #130-095-727), and a 96-well U-bottom plate (Corning, #CLS7007) in iPS Brew with 10 µM Y-27632 1.5 μM CHIR99021 (Miltenyi, #130-106-539), and in the presence of 200 mM dihydrochloride (Miltenyi, #130-106-538), as previously described27.
units.rationale: Describes the seeding density, reagents, and plate format for initiating differentiation.

units.title: Add BDNF and L‑Ascorbic acid on day 14
units.text: On day 14, 20 ng/mL BDNF (Miltenyi, #130-096-286) and 200 µM L-Ascorbic acid (Sigma-Aldrich, #A4403-100MG) were added.
units.rationale: Provides a timed supplementation step to promote maturation of organoids.

units.title: Add db‑cAMP and DAPT from day 16
units.text: From day 16 onward, 0.5 mM db-cAMP (Sigma-Aldrich, #D0627-1G) and 1 μM DAPT (R&D Systems, #2634) were added to the culture.
units.rationale: Specifies later-stage signaling modulators to drive further differentiation.

units.title: Measure cell viability with CyQuant assay
units.text: Cell viability was measured using the colorimetric CyQuant cell proliferation assay (Invitrogen), following the manufacturer’s instructions. Absorbance was analyzed at 480–520 nm, using 50,000 cells harvested.
units.rationale: Outlines a quantitative assay to assess cell health.

units.title: Detect apoptosis by flow cytometry
units.text: Apoptosis was detected via ﬂow cytometry staining using the Alexa Fluor 647 Annexin V conjugate (BD Pharmingen, #A23204) and Click-iT plus Tunel assay (Invitrogen #C10617) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
units.rationale: Describes a combined staining protocol for measuring programmed cell death.

units.title: Load single‑cell suspensions onto 10x Genomics chips
units.text: single-cell suspensions were loaded onto 10x Geno- Single Cell 3′ Chips along with the mastermix as per the manufacturer’s updates.
units.rationale: Details the preparation of single‑cell libraries for sequencing.

units.title: Sequence libraries on NextSeq500/NovaSeq 6000
units.text: The resulting libraries were sequenced on either a NextSeq500 or a NovaSeq 6000 with the following specifications Read1 28 cycles, Read2 98 cycles, and Index1 8 cycles using a 200-cycle kit.
units.rationale: Specifies the sequencing platform and run parameters.

units.title: Expose organoids to hypoxia
units.text: organoids were transferred to the hypoxia chamber (Binder CB160), which was filled with 1% O2 and 5% CO2 and mixed with N2, and collected after 4, 8, and 16 h.
units.rationale: Provides a controlled hypoxic treatment protocol for functional testing.

units.title: Isolate RNA and perform reverse transcription
units.text: Total RNAs were isolated using the RNeasy Micro Kit (QIAprotein solution (BioLamina, #BS-0101) either alone or functionalized with Lam- GEN#74004) and reverse transcribed using random primers.
units.rationale: Describes RNA extraction and cDNA synthesis for downstream gene expression analysis.
